for those.. who're having.. problems installing...

step 1 - if yu hav alcohol120% installed.. it won't b any problem (unless yu know how to use alcohol120)

step 2 - if not.. download this software http://virtual-clonedrive.en.softonic.com/

step 3 - install n when the step comes to select the file extensions.. select ALL etensions (includes the ISO extension)

step 4 - right click on the new virtual drive [name will be for example = BD-ROM Drive (G:) virtual clone drive]

step 5 - select the options "Virtual Clone drive" then followed by "Mount" n select the destnation file

step 6 - Open the drive n u'll find all the folders n files.. Run the setup from there. u'll find the crack there also if not.. download here.. "http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5945041/Call.of.Duty.Black.Ops-SKIDROW-Crack-[tracker.BTARENA.org]"

step 7 - yu know wht to do with the crack folder.. now this is it.. ENJOY..

Okay, guys, to those who are having problems with dlls; Go Google them. Google the error and download from any site that looks legitimate. 

To those who want to play zombies but can't; Download the patch by visiting the "Call.of.Duty.Black.Ops.Update.1.Read.Nfo-SKIDROW" folder. It's in the "bo" folder that you downloaded, run the patch, let it finish, the go into the "SKIDROW" folder, and copy and paste the files to where you installed your game when you ran the FIRST installer. 

To those who want to play MP, go but it, or find a magical torrent. There won't be any. Play with your friends via LAN or Hamachi or some shit. You figure it out. If you have any more questions, PM me.
